d.description: Architecture improvements for scaling to 1000+ shapes
d.name: scalability

d.description: Core features needed for Figma-like MVP
d.name: mvp-core

d.description: get_shape() uses iter().find() which is O(n). Add index map for constant-time lookups.
d.title: Add HashMap<ShapeId, usize> for O(1) shape lookup

d.description: world_position() walks parent chain O(depth) per shape per frame. Cache and invalidate on transform/hierarchy change.
d.title: Cache world positions with dirty tracking

d.description: Use generational arena for O(1) lookup and stable IDs. Removes need for separate HashMap.
d.title: Replace Vec<Shape> with SlotMap

d.description: quadtree_rs dependency exists but unused. Implement for shape_at_point to avoid iterating all shapes.
d.title: Add spatial index for hit testing

d.description: clone_render_state() clones all shapes every frame. Use Rc/Arc or dirty tracking for incremental updates.
d.title: Eliminate full clone in render hot path

d.description: Add rotation property to Shape, rotation handles in resize UI, transform matrix in paint.
d.title: Rotation transform

d.description: DragState::Selecting exists but not implemented. Draw marquee and select intersecting shapes.
d.title: Drag selection box

d.description: Snap to grid during move/resize. Configurable grid size, toggle with modifier key.
d.title: Grid snapping

d.description: Add ShapeKind::Group for lightweight grouping without Frame layout behavior.
d.title: Simple groups (non-Frame containers)

d.description: Pin edges to parent (left, right, top, bottom, center). Separate from autolayout.
d.title: Responsive constraints

d.description: ShapeKind::Text with GPUI text rendering. Font family, size, weight, color, alignment.
d.title: Text tool

d.description: ShapeKind::Path with bezier curves. Click to add points, drag for handles.
d.title: Pen tool / vector paths

d.description: Export selected shapes or canvas to PNG (via GPUI) and SVG (manual serialization).
d.title: PNG/SVG export

d.description: Union, subtract, intersect, exclude for shapes. Use lyon or similar for path ops.
d.title: Boolean operations

d.description: Linear and radial gradients with multiple color stops.
d.title: Gradient fills

d.description: Drop shadow, inner shadow, layer blur. May require GPUI shader support.
d.title: Effects (shadows, blur)
